Title: A Framework for Evaluating the Results of the SZZ Approach for Identifying Bug-Introducing Changes
Elements_risk_assessment: Yes, They didn't eliminate all the suspicious false positives
UseOF-SZZ: To evaluate it, they extract the PC looking for the BIC and also descard some of them based on their three criteria
Summary:
The framework evaluates the following criteria: (1) the earliest bug appearance, (2) the future impact of changes, and (3) the realism of bug introduction.
    We use the proposed framework to evaluate five SZZ implementations using data from ten open source projects
Outcome: framework provides a systematic mean for evaluating the data that is generated by a given SZZ implementation
